member.name: T:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.OperationExecutor
member.summary: A version-resilient, AppDomain-and-reflection-friendly facade for command operations.

member.name: T:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.Internal.ForwardingProxy`1
member.summary: This is a small piece of Remoting magic. It enables us to invoke methods on a remote object without knowing its actual type. The only restriction is that the names and shapes of the types and their members must be the same on each side of the boundary.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.Internal.ForwardingProxy`1.Invoke(System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage)
member.summary: Intercepts method invocations on the object represented by the current instance and forwards them to the target to finish processing.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.ToolsStrings.ClassLibrariesNotSupportedInCli(System.Object)
member.summary: This preview of Entity Framework tools does not support targeting class library projects in ASP.NET Core and .NET Core applications. See {fwlink} for details and workarounds.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.ToolsStrings.ProjectDependencyCommandNotFound(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Could not invoke this command on the project. Check that the version of {projectCommand} in "tools" and "dependencies" are the same. See {fwlink} for more details.
